tag_list: brazilian, brazil, web, semantic, search, engine
overview:
Brynner is an UI Designer, Web Developer, Publicist and Entrepreneur who is always learning from the market trends and evaluating the great possibilities that online businesses can offer.

He is currently working at Wup, an international Web 3.0 startup, based on Semantic Web and Artificial Intelligence. This was a finalist in a startup competition at the last Campus Party Brazil 2011 in Sao Paulo and La Red Innova Open Talent 2011 in Madrid.
